message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split.
Let's try 55/45, it's more fair considering the inflation
The inflation is hitting you harder, Bob. I'll take 55% now.
Inflation is a factor, but I still think I deserve the bigger share
This is my last offer above 50%, Bob.  The clock is ticking.
50/50 is the fairest split, considering we're running out of time
